fieldAssignment.warningDescription: Please assign all fields to signers before sending invitations

invitePage.step1Description: Add people who need to sign
invitePage.step1Alert: Add signers and configure signing order

orderSelector.sequentialDescription: Signers will sign in the order specified
orderSelector.parallelDescription: All signers can sign at the same time

inviteForm.emailDuplicate: This email has already been added
inviteForm.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters

signingRoom.invalidTokenDescription: This signing link is invalid or has expired
signingRoom.declinedDescription: You have declined to sign this document
signingRoom.completedDescription: Thank you for signing this document

signingRoom.instructions: Please review the document and fill in all required fields to complete signing

useSigning.fillAllFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields before completing
useSigning.alreadyCompleted: This document has already been signed or declined

completeDialog.title: Complete Signing?
completeDialog.warningDescription: Once you complete, you cannot modify your signature
completeDialog.finalNote: By clicking confirm, you agree to electronically sign this document

declineDialog.title: Decline to Sign?
declineDialog.warningDescription: This will notify the document owner that you declined to sign
declineDialog.reasonMinLength: Reason must be at least 10 characters

declineDialog.note: Your reason will be sent to the document owner
